main event: A lighted aerial object was sighted moving slowly in a straight line, described as the size of a small aircraft, for about 5-10 seconds.
interesting points: The object appeared to tremble as it moved., The object was solid, approximately 14 inches square, and charcoal in color., The object slowly appeared and disappeared with no sound., Witness estimated the object's speed to be around 233 mph., The witness estimated the object's distance to be about 1300 feet away.
sighted object: a lighted aerial object, charcoal color, approximately 14 inches square
witness description: Private John Doe, U.S. Army, credible observer
